Name: Banana Split
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: STIR first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Shake a sealed container of cream and carefully POUR over the back of a spoon to form a small white spot floating in the centre of the drink.
Review: A banana-flavoured after-dinner sipper of cocktail with coconut water subtly flavouring and smoothing cognac.
History: Created in April 2016 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Banana Split contains 183 calories
Garnish: Lightly dust surface of drink with chocolate powder & banana chunk on rim
